Stupid Pacemaker XML tricks
http://blog.oddbit.com/post/2015-02-19-stupid-pacemaker-xml-tricks/ 2015-02-19T00:00:00+0000 2015-02-19T00:00:00+0000 I’ve recently spent some time working with Pacemaker, and ended up with an interesting collection of XPath snippets that I am publishing here for your use and/or amusement. Check if there are any inactive resources pcs status xml | xmllint --xpath '//resource[@active="false"]' - >&/dev/null && echo "There are inactive resources" This selects any resource (//resource) in the output of pcs status xml that has the attribute active set to false.
